dc_title_s: Geological map of the environs of Marquette, Negaunee and Ishpeming; by C. Rominger.
dc_description_s: Relief shown by hachures and spot heights. "Julius Bien, lith. N.Y." From Rominger, Carl Ludwig. Upper Peninsula, 1878-1880, accompanied by a geological map. New York: Julius Bien, 1881. 1 map: hand col.; 46 x 76 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Rominger, Carl Ludwig, 1820-1907.,Bien, Julius, 1826-1909.,De La Vergne, Earl W. PRO,Michigan. Geological Survey.
